    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle functionality
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const mobileMenuButton = document.querySelector('button[aria-expanded="false"]');
            if (mobileMenuButton) {
                mobileMenuButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const expanded = this.getAttribute('aria-expanded') === 'true' || false;
                    this.setAttribute('aria-expanded', !expanded);
                    const menu = document.querySelector('#mobile-menu');
                    if (menu) {
                        menu.classList.toggle('hidden');
                    }
                });
            }
            
            // Add hover effect to fact cards
            const factCards = document.querySelectorAll('.fact-card');
            factCards.forEach(card => {
                card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(-10px)';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)';
                });
                
                card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                    this.style.transform = '';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '';
                });
            });
            
            // Video play functionality
            const videoThumbnails = document.querySelectorAll('.video-thumbnail');
            videoThumbnails.forEach(thumbnail => {
                thumbnail.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const videoTitle = this.nextElementSibling.querySelector('h3').textContent;
                    alert('Now playing: ' + videoTitle + '\n(Simulated video player would open)');
                });
            });
            
            // Category filter functionality
            const categoryButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.category-btn');
            categoryButtons.forEach(button => {
                button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const category = this.textContent.trim();
                    alert('Showing all content for: ' + category);
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Science Nexus | Exploring the Wonders of Science</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary: #3b82f6;
            --secondary: #10b981;
            --dark: #1e293b;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            background-color: #f8fafc;
            color: var(--dark);
        }
        
        .hero-gradient {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.9) 0%, rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.9) 100%);
        }
        
        .fact-card {
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            transform-style: preserve-3d;
        }
        
        .fact-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
        }
        
        .video-thumbnail::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.7) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
        }
        
        .category-btn {
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .category-btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--primary);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .blob {
            position: absolute;
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1) 0%, rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1) 100%);
            border-radius: 50%;
            filter: blur(20px);
            z-index: -1;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <nav class="bg-white shadow-sm">

    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle functionality
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const mobileMenuButton = document.querySelector('button[aria-expanded="false"]');
            if (mobileMenuButton) {
                mobileMenuButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const expanded = this.getAttribute('aria-expanded') === 'true' || false;
                    this.setAttribute('aria-expanded', !expanded);
                    const menu = document.querySelector('#mobile-menu');
                    if (menu) {
                        menu.classList.toggle('hidden');
                    }
                });
            }
            
            // Add hover effect to fact cards
            const factCards = document.querySelectorAll('.fact-card');
            factCards.forEach(card => {
                card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(-10px)';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)';
                });
                
                card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                    this.style.transform = '';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '';
                });
            });
            
            // Video play functionality
            const videoThumbnails = document.querySelectorAll('.video-thumbnail');
            videoThumbnails.forEach(thumbnail => {
                thumbnail.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const videoTitle = this.nextElementSibling.querySelector('h3').textContent;
                    alert('Now playing: ' + videoTitle + '\n(Simulated video player would open)');
                });
            });
            
            // Category filter functionality
            const categoryButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.category-btn');
            categoryButtons.forEach(button => {
                button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const category = this.textContent.trim();
                    alert('Showing all content for: ' + category);
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

These changes will:
1. Add admin panel access
2. Set up dynamic content loading
3. Prepare for Firebase database integration
4. Set template variables for dynamic content

For hosting, you'll need to:
1. Create a Firebase project
2. Fill in your Firebase config details
3. Create Firestore collections for 'facts' and 'videos'
4. Host on Firebase, Netlify, or similar service

            background-color: #f8fafc;
            color: var(--dark);
        }
        
        .hero-gradient {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.9) 0%, rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.9) 100%);
        }

            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            transform-style: preserve-3d;
        }
        
        .fact-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
        }

            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.7) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
        }
        
        .category-btn {
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .category-btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--primary);
            color: white;
        }

            position: absolute;
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1) 0%, rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1) 100%);
            border-radius: 50%;

    <!-- Database Connection -->
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/8.10.0/firebase-app.js"></script>
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/8.10.0/firebase-firestore.js"></script>
    <script>
        // Firebase config
        const firebaseConfig = {
            apiKey: "YOUR_API_KEY",
            authDomain: "YOUR_AUTH_DOMAIN",
            projectId: "YOUR_PROJECT_ID",
            storageBucket: "YOUR_STORAGE_BUCKET",
            messagingSenderId: "YOUR_SENDER_ID",
            appId: "YOUR_APP_ID"
        };
        
        // Initialize Firebase
        firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);
        const db = firebase.firestore();
        // Mobile menu toggle functionality
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const mobileMenuButton = document.querySelector('button[aria-expanded="false"]');
            if (mobileMenuButton) {
                mobileMenuButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const expanded = this.getAttribute('aria-expanded') === 'true' || false;
                    this.setAttribute('aria-expanded', !expanded);
                    const menu = document.querySelector('#mobile-menu');
                    if (menu) {
                        menu.classList.toggle('hidden');
                    }
                });
            }
            
            // Add hover effect to fact cards
            const factCards = document.querySelectorAll('.fact-card');
            factCards.forEach(card => {
                card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(-10px)';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)';
                });
                
                card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                    this.style.transform = '';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '';
                });
            });
            
            // Video play functionality
            const videoThumbnails = document.querySelectorAll('.video-thumbnail');
            videoThumbnails.forEach(thumbnail => {
                thumbnail.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const videoTitle = this.nextElementSibling.querySelector('h3').textContent;
                    alert('Now playing: ' + videoTitle + '\n(Simulated video player would open)');
                });
            });
            
            // Category filter functionality
            const categoryButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.category-btn');
            categoryButtons.forEach(button => {
                button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const category = this.textContent.trim();
                    alert('Showing all content for: ' + category);
                });
            });

            // Load facts from database
            db.collection("facts").get().then((querySnapshot) => {
                const factsContainer = document.querySelector('.grid-cols-1');
                querySnapshot.forEach((doc) => {
                    // Add fact cards dynamically
                });
            });

            // Load videos from database 
            db.collection("videos").get().then((querySnapshot) => {
                const videosContainer = document.querySelector('.grid-cols-1');
                querySnapshot.forEach((doc) => {
                    // Add video cards dynamically
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
